actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish the National Academies of Practices.

summary.text: Grants a Federal charter to the National Academies of Practice. States that the purpose of the academies shall be to: (1) honor persons who have made significant contributions to the practice of health care professions; and (2) improve the practices in these professions.

titles.title: A bill to establish the National Academies of Practices.
